record.dc:title: 193BE3, 15BE3, Boone County, Kentucky. Robbins Large Mound Site. General Progress Photograph
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: Tombs indicated are 28, 29, 36, 30, 34, and 25. Many segments of profile with 90' face main background face. Photograph taken from the north and from atop the photographic tower. For detailed description see Photo 189 which is almost identical with this. In this photograph Tomb #30 has been completely exposed, also Tomb #34. More of the 90-95' section has been moved exposing the large intrusive pit #21 to a greater depth in the 90' profile.
